Title: Kedah Tourism Analytics Dashboard
Description: Interactive web platform analyzing real-time tourism data across Kedah state. Provides insights on visitor trends, transport routes, events, and sentiment through dynamic charts and geospatial maps, supporting data-driven decision-making for tourism stakeholders.
Features: Real-time visitor & social media engagement analytics
Interactive geospatial mapping with destinations and routes
Event attendance tracking and transport mode statistics
Sentiment analysis and dynamic location ranking

Title: AIU BookEase - Facilities Booking System
Description: Web-based application enabling students and staff to book campus facilities online. Built with Django and MySQL, it automates reservations, prevents double bookings, and allows admins to manage facility availability with real-time updates.
Features: User authentication with role-based access control
Real-time facility browsing and availability checking
Automated booking system with conflict prevention
Admin dashboard for approval and facility management

Title: US Education & Income Data Analysis
Description: Comprehensive analysis of US education levels and household income across all states using census data from 2016. Features interactive visualizations exploring the correlation between educational attainment and median household income with state-level comparisons.
Features: Interactive choropleth map showing median household income by state
Statistical analysis of doctoral degree holders vs income correlation
Population demographics breakdown by education level
Comprehensive state rankings and comparative analytics

Title: Global Water Access Analysis (2020)
Description: Detailed analysis of global access to drinking water in 2020, exploring four service levels (Basic, Limited, Unimproved, Surface) across 7.79 billion population. Examines disparities between national, urban, and rural populations with descriptive statistics and visualizations to guide interventions.
Features: Population distribution analysis across urban and rural settings
Box plot comparisons of water service levels by region
Stacked bar charts showing national, rural, and urban water access
Descriptive statistics with central tendency and spread measures
